TopicTitle: Physics Breakers; How to Break the Laws of Physics - Part 2 - Air Hogging

Articles.Content:
I made a second video on my Physics Breakers series!

The first one dealt with using control surfaces and winglets to generate thrust from nothing.

This one shows how to make an aircraft that ascend to insane altitudes and speeds with only jets, to the point where the plane is flung out to beyond Dres orbit!

Here's the video in question:
